column4: hello can anyone tell me why I cant copy a file from HDD ro USB stick (it's saying read only)
hello can anyone tell me why I cant copy a file from HDD to USB stick (it's saying read only)
it appears your USB stick is mounted read only. You'll have to mount it with write access.
see if this link helps you: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=40854
